titleStmt.title: Newyddion mawr oddiwrth y [ser] neu almanacc am y flwŷddŷn o oed [brace] Y bŷd 5643. Crist 1694. Yn dangos ... / O W[neuthuriad Thomas Jones.]
titleStmt.author: Jones, Thomas, 1648-1713.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: torn and stained, with considerable loss of text. Bracketed material in title from other eds.; publication information from Wing (2nd ed.); best copy availabale for photographing.
Reproduction of original in: Llyfrgell Genedlaethol Cymru/National Library of Wales, Aberystwyth, Wales.
